summary: The CFL is Canada's top professional football league, featuring nine teams across the country. It's divided into two divisions: East (four teams) and West (five teams). The season lasts 21 weeks, with each team playing 18 games. After the regular season, the top six teams battle in a three-week playoff, culminating in the Grey Cup, Canada's biggest annual sports event. The CFL was formed in 1958 when two older football unions merged.
title: Canadian Football League
